    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ac862bca-7b09-4418-9462-c6d4d97fa3dd#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kalandozó magyarok</string>
            <string language="en">The Adventurous Hungarians</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abenteuerlichen Ungarn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Hongrois Aventureux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Hungarians Aventurosos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli Ungheresi Avventurosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τολμηροί Ούγγροι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Húngaros Adventureros</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kalandozó magyarok bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction of The Adventurous Hungarians</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">támadások,  ló,  lovasság,  Magyar Fejedelemség,  Merseburg,  Augsburg,  Sankt Gallen,  Konstantinápoly,  Bizánc,  </string>
            <string language="en">attacks,  horse,  cavalry, Hungarian Principality,  Merseburg,  Augsburg,  Sankt Gallen, Constantinople,  Byzante,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung der abenteuerlichen Ungarn</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction des Hongrois aventureux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução dos hungarians aventurosos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione degli ungheresi avventurosi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή των τολμηρών Ούγγρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción de los húngaros adventureros</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angriffe, Pferd, Kavallerie, ungarisches Fürstentum, 
Merseburg, Augsburg, Sankt Gallen, Konstantinopolis, Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attaques, cheval, cavalerie, Principauté hongroise, 
Merseburg, Augsbourg, Sankt Gallen, Constantinople, Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ataques, cavalo, cavalaria, principality hungarian, 
Merseburg, Augsburg, Sankt Gallen, Constantinople, Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attacchi, cavallo, cavalry, principality ungherese, 
Merseburg, Augusta, Sankt Gallen, Constantinople, Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιθέσεις, άλογο, ιππικό, ουγγρικό πριγκηπάτο, 
Merseburg, Αουγκσμπουργκ, Sankt Gallen, Κωνσταντινούπολη, 
Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ataques, caballo, caballería, principado húngaro, 
Merseburg, Augsburg, Sankt Gallen, Constantinople, Byzante,</string>
          </keyword>
